info.title: OEM EV Warranty Management System API
info.description: Complete API specification for OEM Electric Vehicle Warranty Management System. This system manages warranty claims, parts inventory, service centers, and customer relationships for electric vehicle manufacturers.

bearerAuth.description: JWT token-based authentication. Include token in Authorization header as: Bearer <token>

refreshToken.description: Refresh token for obtaining new access token

first.description: Whether this is the first page

last.description: Whether this is the last page

post.description: Authenticate user and receive access/refresh tokens
Get new access token using refresh token
Send password reset email to user

get.description: Check if current token is valid
Retrieve paginated list of customers (ADMIN, SC_STAFF, EVM_STAFF only)

post.description: Create new customer (ADMIN, SC_STAFF, EVM_STAFF only)

put.description: Update customer information (ADMIN, SC_STAFF, EVM_STAFF only)

get.description: Retrieve vehicles owned by current customer (CUSTOMER only)
Retrieve paginated list of warranty claims (ADMIN, SC_STAFF only)

post.description: Submit new warranty claim (ADMIN, SC_STAFF only)

patch.description: Reject warranty claim with reason (ADMIN only)
Start work on warranty claim (SC_TECHNICIAN only)
Mark warranty claim as completed (SC_TECHNICIAN only)

get.description: Retrieve customer's own warranty claims (CUSTOMER only)

post.description: Submit feedback for warranty claim (CUSTOMER only)
Add new part to catalog (ADMIN, EVM_STAFF only)

get.description: Retrieve all part requests (ADMIN, EVM_STAFF only)

post.description: Request parts for warranty claim (SC_TECHNICIAN only)

patch.description: Update part request status to shipped (ADMIN, EVM_STAFF only)

get.description: Get service centers within radius of coordinates
Public endpoint to browse service centers

tags.name: Service Centers
tags.description: Service center directory and location services
